column4: yep tha'ts what i do but StarKruzr should know that the group file modifiation/editing is not a proper way of modifying group/users. It mostly is all you need to do on a plain desktop ubuntu but not with other type of authentification media
what other types of "authentification media"? could you elaborate on that?
like ldap or any other pam plugins involving anything not related to shadow, users, group files
are you suggesting that he should modify those parameters through systems commands (ex: usermod)?
